entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5 except minus 1 in a few localities. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5 except minus 1 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7 except minus 3 in a few localities. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon.
